name: Head Over Heels (itch)
description:
Play as a jaded college student who signs up for a dating app called Findr. Navigate through your dating and personal life in the hopes of having a happy last year in college. 

Created by the DDSG Members: 

BONA, Mark Jericho

  • Programmer 
  • Full Stack Developer 
  • Visual Novel Dialogue system
